scripts.deploy: yarn build && sam deploy --resolve-s3 --stack-name personal-website --region us-east-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides DeploymentTimestamp=$(date +%s)
scripts.deploy:guided: yarn build && sam deploy --guided --stack-name personal-website --region us-east-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides DeploymentTimestamp=$(date +%s)
scripts.invalidate-cache: aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id $(aws cloudfront list-distributions --query "DistributionList.Items[?DomainName=='d3uk1vljw85z1q.cloudfront.net'].Id" --output text) --paths "/*"
